faqs.question: Kunnen buitenlanders vastgoed kopen in Spanje?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restriction. Non-residents and non-EU citizens face identical purchasing terms as Spanish nationals—no special permits or approvals required. Bank mortgages are available to qualified foreign buyers through Spanish lenders. Legal process utilizes English-speaking notaries and property lawyers, streamlining documentation for international purchasers.

faqs.question: Wat zijn de kosten van het kopen van vastgoed in Spanje?
faqs.answer: Purchasing costs typically total 8-10% of property price: transfer tax (6-8% regional variation), notary fees (0.5-1%), legal fees (0.5-1%), and registration costs (0.5%). At €139,000 purchase price, expect €11,120-€13,900 total acquisition costs. These represent competitive rates compared to UK stamp duty and conveyancing charges.
